controller

Class AlbumViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AlbumViewController

  • public class AlbumViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    AlbumViewController is the class for controlling the Album Page. The respective view is album.fxml This class is used for viewing all of the thumbnails of each photo in the album The user can: View a photo, copy a photo, move a photo, delete a photo
    Author:
    Chris LoPresti, Kyle Myers

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      java.lang.String workingDirectory

      AlbumViewController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPhoto()
      Takes a photo from a file chooser and attempts to add it to an album If the photo can be added, it will add the photo to the album and rewrite the user
      void copyPhoto(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, Photo photo)
      This will copy a photo from one album to another
      void deletePhoto(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, Photo photo)
      Deletes a photo when the delete button is pressed on the cell factory
      void goHome(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This will take the user back to the user home which is controlled by the UserController and the user.fxml gui
      void initialize(Album a, User u)
      Attemps to load all images from the image directory, and populate a listview with cell factories that hold options pertain to photos Once the listview is populated a user can interact with each cell factory A user can view a photo, copy a photo, move a photo, and delete a photo through the buttons displayed in each cell factoy
      void logout(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This will log the user out and take them to the login page
      void movePhoto(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, Photo photo)
      This will move a photo from one album to another Moving a photo will delete it in the directroy that it was moved from
      void viewPhoto(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, Photo photo)
      Loads the PhotoViewController and the photo.fxml gui

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Album a,
                       User u)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Attemps to load all images from the image directory, and populate a listview with cell factories that hold options pertain to photos Once the listview is populated a user can interact with each cell factory A user can view a photo, copy a photo, move a photo, and delete a photo through the buttons displayed in each cell factoy
        Parameters:
        mainStage - The main stage * @throws IOException Exception for loading in photos
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
